USB_Notification_t Struct Reference

#include <RNDISEthernet.h>

Data Fields

uint8_t bmRequestType
uint8_t bNotification
uint16_t wValue
uint16_t wIndex
uint16_t wLength

Detailed Description

Type define for a RNDIS notification message, for transmission to the RNDIS host via the notification Endpoint.

Field Documentation

uint8_t USB_Notification_t::bmRequestType

Notification type, a mask of values from SrdRequestType.h

uint8_t USB_Notification_t::bNotification

Notification index, indicating what the RNDIS notification relates to

uint16_t USB_Notification_t::wIndex

Two byte notification index parameter

uint16_t USB_Notification_t::wLength

Size of data payload following the notification header

uint16_t USB_Notification_t::wValue

Two byte notification value parameter
